packages.name: MoveText
packages.description: Select text and drag it around, or setup a text "tunnel" to move code from one location to another.
packages.author: Colin Thomas-Arnold (colinta)

packages.name: TransposeCharacter
packages.description: Swaps two characters, lines, words, or reverse a word.  Depending on cursor location and selection(s).
packages.author: Colin Thomas-Arnold (colinta)

packages.name: Bracketeer
packages.description: Some bracket manipulation, selection, and insertion commands.
packages.author: Colin Thomas-Arnold (colinta)

packages.name: Quickfind
packages.description: Works similarly to TextMate's `ctrl+s`.  But if text is already selected, it will be the default search.  Keep pressing `ctrl+s` to search for the next instance.
packages.author: Colin Thomas-Arnold (colinta)

packages.name: SimpleMovements
packages.description: Adds caret moving and newline entering commands.
packages.author: Colin Thomas-Arnold (colinta)

packages.name: StringEncode
packages.description: Converts characters from one "encoding" to another using a transformation (think HTML entities, not character encodings).
packages.author: Colin Thomas-Arnold (colinta)

packages.name: FileDiffs
packages.description: Show diffs between the current file, or selection(s) in the current file, and clipboard, another file, or unsaved changes.
packages.author: Colin Thomas-Arnold (colinta)

packages.name: MarkAndMove
packages.description: Allows for keyboard-only multiple selections.  Select some stuff, mark it, then move the cursor around and add more marks, recall marks, or move between marks.
packages.author: Colin Thomas-Arnold (colinta)
